properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 8 at 9:34PM PST until February 10 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...None.

* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 45 mph
expected. Sierra ridge winds will be 80 mph and higher at times.

* WHERE...Mono County.

* WHEN...From 10 AM Sunday to 4 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds may blow around unsecured objects.
Downed trees or tree limbs could result in power outages.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel restrictions may be in place for
high profile vehicles along US-395.
properties.instruction:
Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio
furniture, decorations, and trash cans before winds increase
which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is
prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and
water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in
the event of a power outage.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SUNDAY TO 4 AM PST MONDAY
